_instructions: 1. Copy this entire 'mcpServers' object to your Claude Desktop config file:
2. Update 'CEF_BRIDGE_PORT' to match Athena Browser's CDP port (default: 9222)
5. Claude will now have access to 40+ browser automation tools!

perception: vision_find_by_text - Find elements by text using vision
interaction: targets_resolve - Resolve semantic hints to elements
session: safety_set_policy - Set domain allowlists and budgets

_example_prompts: Navigate to google.com and search for 'web scraping best practices'
Find all forms on this page and tell me what fields they have
Click the login button and wait for the page to load
Fill out the search form with 'machine learning' and submit it
Get the accessibility tree of this page
Extract the main content from this article
Monitor network requests and tell me which API endpoints are being called
Take a screenshot and annotate all interactive elements
Save the current session so I can restore it later
Check if the 'Submit' button is visible and clickable

connection_refused: Make sure Athena Browser is running: ./scripts/run.sh
tools_not_working: Test with MCP Inspector: CEF_BRIDGE_PORT=9222 npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector npx athena-browser-mcp
permission_errors: Update ALLOWED_FILE_DIRS to include your downloads folder
Make sure directories exist and are readable
